description.value:
Your blessed touch can heal wounds. You have a pool of healing power that replenishes when you take a long rest. With that pool, you can restore a total number of hit points equal to 5 times your paladin level.

As an action, you can touch a creature and draw power from the pool to restore a number of hit points to that creature, up to the maximum amount remaining in your pool. Alternatively, you can expend 25 hit points from your pool of healing to cast the @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.F0GsG0SJzsIOacwV]{Lesser Restoration} spell without expending a spell slot.

This feature has no effect on undead and constructs.

activation.condition: Target cannot be Undead or a Construct.
